title: Hooray for the peons
body: <p><a href="http://msnbc.msn.com/id/5829707/" title="...and the ranks of uninsured grow by 1.4 million, Census Bureau says">1.3 million more Americans in poverty</a>.  15.6% of all NYS residents don't have health insurance.  Yikes!  At least <a href="http://news.google.com/news?q=gas%20prices" title="no it's not">gas is cheap</a>.</p>

bodyNavItems.text: Ron Burgundy says it's the greatest song ever - or he'll fight you
